name: This Too Too Solid Flesh
description:
The worst has happened. You are dealing with the consequences. 

Shape your character. Try to remember your past. Deal with the mutilated wreck that used to be your body - now part of an alien, thrumming machine - and decide what you are willing to sacrifice to regain whatever lingering dregs of selfhood remains. 

A game about relationships, about memory, and about embodiment. 

- CW: body horror and general gore, memory loss, death.

- Choose your pronouns, sexuality, and history.

- Try to keep yourself alive, or become a martyr.

template from https://nyehilism.itch.io/sugarcube-template, created by nyehilism on itch.io. 

find them at https://nyehilismwriting.tumblr.com/
